name: Interdimensional Dragon, Mystery-flare Dragon
effect:
(This card cannot be in your main deck)
[Stride](Released when both players' vanguards are grade 3 or greater!)-Stride Step-[Choose one or more cards with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater from your hand, and discard them] [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. (When this card strides, it gains the power and card name of one heart. At the end of the turn, return it face up)
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 4] When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, you may reveal four cards from the top of your deck. If the revealed cards have four or more different grades, you may pay the cost. If you do, you get an additional turn. If you had revealed cards, shuffle your deck.

name: Chronojet Dragon
effect:
[AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2](This ability is active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):When this unit attacks a vanguard, until end of that battle, this unit gets [Power] +5000, and your opponent cannot call grade 1 or greater units from hand to (GC).
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 1] During your turn, when your G unit [Stride], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and your opponent puts that unit on the bottom of his or her deck.

name: Smithereen Colossus
effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.

effect:

[AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or less rear-guards, and your opponent puts that unit on the bottom of his or her deck.

If you do, choose one of your opponent's grade 2 or less rear-guards, and your opponent puts that unit on the bottom of his or her deck.

name: Withdrawn Gear Raven
effect:
[CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)
[AUTO]:[Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your units that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.
